CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) +4, 1, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) +3, 2, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) +3, 3, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) +5, 4, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) +5, 5, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) +5, 6, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) +5,null)
CustomField.label: Order Expiry Date
